front.title: Alert Filtration and Fusion(AFF) in Intrusion Management System

abstract.t: Alert Filtration and Fusion (AFF) is proposed to solve the problems of existing IMS(Intrusion Management System). The Alert Filtration is used to filtrate original alerts and reduce the alerts which are obviously unavailable. The Alert Fusion is used to reduce redundant alerts and find the relationships of alerts. The false positive rate and false negative rate can be reduced by Alert Filtration and Fusion.
